mcq.statement: Choose the CORRECT sentence: It was awfully good of you to propose a day's picnic at Murree., It was very good off you too propose days picnic in Murree, It was greatly good by you to proposd day's picnic at murree, It was awfully good by you to proposed a day's picnic in Murree.

options.a: It was awfully good of you to propose a day's picnic at Murree.
options.b: It was very good off you too propose days picnic in Murree
options.c: It was greatly good by you to proposd day's picnic at murree
options.d: It was awfully good by you to proposed a day's picnic in Murree.
